title: Strategies for Enhancing Interaction in Online and Face-to-Face Classes Using Digital Devices

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device usage skills and experience with online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Digital device management requirements for language learning in smartphone-centric constrained technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more interaction strategies using digital devices in online/face-to-face classroom settings.
Learners can apply two or more techniques for identifying digital distractions and enhancing focus during class.
Through project-based assessment, learners can design a digital collaboration system among peers.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
